answers.answer: I drink tons of water and split up my meals! Are you on insulin? Btw i was a diabetic on insulin before pregnancy. My last a1c was a 5.6
No and I just found out I'm diabetes
Do you have to take meds now? And do you have ultrasounds to check the babies fluid and size? I also found out I have Gestational Diabetes and was prescribed meds.
Just drink lots of water. Eat smaller meals and try to avoid carb as much as you can. Replace it with protein and veggie

question: hey guys hope all of you doing wellI'm 30 week and I just got my blood tests results it saying I'm diabetic :(I had it in the pass but it was self controlNow I need you help plz advice me of how to keep in control so it won't effect my babyThank you
title: 30 week and diabetic
